insert(",w")
sleep(300ms)
insert("4")
sleep(200ms)

sleep(100ms)

sleep(300ms)
insert("{repository}")
sleep(300ms)
key(enter)
sleep(100ms)
insert("a")
sleep(300ms)

# go to submitted file

insert(",w")
sleep(300ms)
insert("1")
sleep(200ms)
key(esc)
sleep(100ms)
